name: Paul The Duck
description: Paul The Duck is my Unfinished Project made for GameDev.tv GameJam, the theme was "Death is only beggining! ". I did not finish this project because i did not have much time. I plan to finish this game on eg. "Finish Your Game" Jam. Paul The Duck was supposed to be a multiplayer game like We Were Here but in isometric view (like my old game hexagon) with unlit graphics like Untitled Goose Project. I planed to add 3 levels.(Funeral House -> Purgatory -> Hell (Player One) & Heaven (Player Two))
